resources.string: If you have chest pain, shortness of breath, head trauma, or have loss of consciousness, go directly to an E.R. or call 911.
Please check your connection and try again
We need to get some information from before we can visit you...anywhere!
Password must be at least six characters long
Welcome to Sickday, please log in
The information you supplied is not correct, try again.
Congratulations! You are now registered with Sickday!
To view or edit insurance information please re-enter your password.
Are you sure you want to call 911?
Are you sure you want to request a Sickday visit?
Your Sickday is confirmed, expect a phone call from us within 5 minutes!
Are you sure you want to log out?

The Content of this app is not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition.


If you think you may have a medical emergency, call your doctor or 911 immediately.


You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold Sickday, its officers, directors, employees, agents, licensors, and suppliers, harmless from and against any claims, actions or demands, liabilities and settlements including without limitation, reasonable legal and accounting fees, resulting from, or alleged to result from incorrectly using this service.
